PageTitle: display mpls te hot-standby state all
FuncDef: The display mpls te hot-standby state all command displays the status of primary and backup LSPs in all hot-standby tunnels as well as the switching results.
CLIs: display mpls te hot-standby state all
display mpls te hot-standby state all verbose

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies to view the verbose information.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls te hot-standby state all
No.        tunnel name                    session id   switch result   overlap
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display mpls te hot-standby state all command displays the status of primary and backup LSPs in tunnels and the switching results.
